description: This Python script demonstrates how to use Pipedream MCP servers with Agno Agents to access Google Calendar data. It sets up an asynchronous agent that connects to the MCP server, runs a task to retrieve calendar events, and handles exceptions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a language model and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools to interact with MCP servers.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes an MCPTools instance, creates an Agent, and prompts it to retrieve calendar events.
